1{-# LANGUAGE RecordWildCards #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Result of relational calculation.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Result
7  ( -- * Result
8    Result (..),
9    InputPoint (..),
10    ResultChunk (..),
11    ShortResultChunks,
12    --resultChunkJudges,
13  
14    -- * Writer
15    ResultWriter (..),
16    ResultWriterFrom,
17    ResultWriterRaw,
18    ResultWriterChunk,
19    ResultWriterJudge,
20    resultDump,
21    putResult, hPutResult,
22  ) where
23
24import qualified System.IO                         as IO
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture          as O
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.System            as O
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base              as B
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax            as S
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type              as T
30
31
32-- ----------------------  Result
33
34-- | Result of calculation.
35data Result c = Result
36    { resultWriter     :: ResultWriter c
37    , resultPrintHead  :: Bool
38    , resultPrintFoot  :: Bool
39    , resultGutter     :: Int
40    , resultMeasure    :: Int
41    , resultInput      :: [InputPoint]
42    , resultOutput     :: B.IOPoint
43    , resultEcho       :: [[String]]
44    , resultLicense    :: [[String]]
45    , resultViolated   :: [ShortResultChunks c]
46    , resultNormal     :: [ShortResultChunks c]
47    , resultClass      :: [S.JudgeClass]
48    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
49
50-- | Input point of data resource.
51data InputPoint = InputPoint
52    { inputPoint      :: B.IOPoint    -- ^ Input point
53    , inputPointAbout :: [S.Tree]     -- ^ Common terms
54    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
55
56-- | Empty result.
57instance (Show c) => B.Default (Result c) where
58    def = Result { resultWriter     = resultDump
59                 , resultPrintHead  = True
60                 , resultPrintFoot  = True
61                 , resultGutter     = 5
62                 , resultMeasure    = 25
63                 , resultInput      = []
64                 , resultOutput     = B.IOPointStdout Nothing
65                 , resultEcho       = []
66                 , resultLicense    = []
67                 , resultViolated   = []
68                 , resultNormal     = []
69                 , resultClass      = [] }
70
71-- | Chunk of judgements.
72data ResultChunk c
73    = ResultJudge  [T.Judge c]             -- ^ List of judges
74    | ResultRel    S.JudgeClass (T.Rel c)  -- ^ Named relation instead of judges
75    | ResultNote   [String]                -- ^ Commentary note
76      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
77
78-- | Short block in result.
79type ShortResultChunks c = S.Short [ResultChunk c]
80
81-- | Extract judgement list from result.
82resultChunkJudges :: ResultChunk c -> [T.Judge c]
83resultChunkJudges (ResultJudge js) = js
84resultChunkJudges _ = []
85
86shortChunkJudges :: [ShortResultChunks c] -> [T.Judge c]
87shortChunkJudges = concatMap resultChunkJudges . concatMap S.shortBody
88
89resultShortChunks :: Result c -> O.Eith [ShortResultChunks c]
90resultShortChunks Result {..}
91    | null violated = Right normal
92    | otherwise     = Left  violated
93    where
94      normal    = resultNormal
95      violated  = S.shortTrim (filter hasJudge O.<$$> resultViolated)
96
97      hasJudge :: ResultChunk c -> Bool
98      hasJudge (ResultJudge js)  = O.some js
99      hasJudge _                 = False
100
101
102-- ----------------------  Writer
103
104-- | Writer of calculation result.
105data ResultWriter c
106    = ResultWriterRaw    String (ResultWriterRaw c)    -- ^ Write from result
107    | ResultWriterChunk  String (ResultWriterChunk c)  -- ^ Write from short chunks
108    | ResultWriterJudge  String (ResultWriterJudge c)  -- ^ Write from judges
109
110instance Show (ResultWriter c) where
111    show w = S.subtypeName w ++ " " ++ B.name w
112
113instance S.SubtypeName (ResultWriter c) where
114    subtypeName (ResultWriterRaw   _ _) = "ResultWriterRaw"
115    subtypeName (ResultWriterChunk _ _) = "ResultWriterChunk"
116    subtypeName (ResultWriterJudge _ _) = "ResultWriterJudge"
117
118instance Ord (ResultWriter c) where
119    compare w1 w2 = B.name w1 `compare` B.name w2
120
121instance Eq (ResultWriter c) where
122    a == b  = compare a b == EQ
123
124instance B.Name (ResultWriter c) where
125    name (ResultWriterRaw   n _) = n
126    name (ResultWriterChunk n _) = n
127    name (ResultWriterJudge n _) = n
128
129-- | Type of result writer function.
130type ResultWriterFrom d c = IO.Handle -> Result c -> B.ExitCode -> d -> IO B.ExitCode
131
132-- | Write result based on result itself.
133type ResultWriterRaw c = ResultWriterFrom () c
134
135-- | Write result based on its short chunks.
136type ResultWriterChunk c = ResultWriterFrom [ShortResultChunks c] c
137
138-- | Write result based on its judges.
139type ResultWriterJudge c = ResultWriterFrom [T.Judge c] c
140
141-- | Dump result.
142resultDump :: (Show c) => ResultWriter c
143resultDump = ResultWriterRaw "show" hPutShow
144
145hPutShow :: (Show c) => ResultWriterRaw c
146hPutShow h result status () = do IO.hPutStrLn h $ show result
147                                 return status
148
149-- | Print calculation result.
150putResult :: Result c -> IO B.ExitCode
151putResult result =
152    case resultOutput result of
153      B.IOPointStdout _    -> hPutResult B.stdout result
154      B.IOPointOutput h    -> hPutResult (B.handle h) result
155      B.IOPointFile _ path -> do h <- IO.openFile path IO.WriteMode
156                                 n <- hPutResult h result
157                                 IO.hClose h
158                                 return n
159      output -> B.bug $ "putResult " ++ show output
160
161-- | Print result of calculation, and return status.
162hPutResult :: IO.Handle -> Result c -> IO B.ExitCode
163hPutResult h result =
164    case resultShortChunks result of
165      Right sh  -> hPutAllChunks h result (O.exitCode 0) sh
166      Left  sh  -> hPutAllChunks h result (O.exitCode 1) sh
167
168hPutAllChunks :: ResultWriterChunk c
169hPutAllChunks h result status sh =
170    do B.hSetKoshuOutput h
171       case resultWriter result of
172         ResultWriterRaw   _ w  -> w h result status ()
173         ResultWriterChunk _ w  -> w h result status sh
174         ResultWriterJudge _ w  -> w h result status $ shortChunkJudges sh
